metadata.title: CVE-2018-7999 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
In libgraphite2 in graphite2 1.3.11, a NULL pointer dereferencevulnerability was found in Segment.cpp during a dumbRendering operation,which may allow attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly haveunspecified other impact via a crafted .ttf file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7999` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgraphite2-3 - 1.3.11-2
libgraphite2-utils - 1.3.11-2
python3-graphite2 - 1.3.11-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: graphite2 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.11-2').
